website_summaries.verdict: These boots receive high praise from owners across the board, from their quality leather and stitching to their Vibram soles.
pros: Vibram soles give them excellent traction
GORE-TEX liner keeps feet warm and comfortable
cons: While the thick leather adds to their quality, this can also add to the break in time
These run about a half-size too small

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, quality material, and comfortable. My first pair of Danner Quarry boots lasted about two years. I work with water and fertilizer every day 7 months out of the year. I only oiled my boots maybe twice so I could have gotten more life out of them if I took better care of them. I had a pair of RedBacks last longer but I like the feel of these better. I only experienced water leakage once the boots started to come apart at the seems. I liked them enough to buy a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Hungus

customer_reviews.title: Danner is the ONLY boot that I will buy! Third pair in 4 years!
customer_reviews.text: 3 years/1 year / brand new ! These are the most comfortable boots I have ever owned, I’m in Landscape construction and the only reason I replace these boots is water intrusion. Vibram soles last forever! These are the boots that only get replaced with the same boots, Danner are the last boots you’ll ever buy. Warm in winter and breathe great for the 100 Degree California summers. The only person who would complain about the price of Danner boots is someone who’s never owned a pair!
customer_reviews.author: Don Shane

customer_reviews.title: BEST BOOTS MONEY CAN BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I researched online for the best Leather Boots, and after reading many reviews and watching many Youtube videos I decided to buy these, and I'm glad I did. They fit great right out of the box, true to size, and almost zero break-in time. Comfortable and easy to walk in. I'm a truck driver and I'm in and out of my truck all day. Pair these boots up with Ballston 83% Wool Heavyweight Expedition Weight Hunting Socks and you've got the Perfect Match for working, hunting, hiking year round, especially in winter. And they're MADE IN AMERICA -- Sit up and pay attention other shoe/boot manufacturers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA.
customer_reviews.text: Well made boot. Non safety toe boots runs about a quarter size too big in width and toe box. (The steel toe version could be a quarter size bigger in the toe box). Insole is a bit low in arch support and slightly too firm for my taste but is easily replaced with a thicker gel or superfeet insole with higher arch support to solve the quarter size too big feeling. Stitching and leather craft is outstanding. I don’t mind spending coin on a solid pair of well made quality boots that will give me a couple, few years of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Otis P. Body

customer_reviews.title: Buy American-made! They’re worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Really solid American-made product. I was a life-long Wolverine fan (actually worked for them years ago). I’m converted now. I’ve worn them outside for work every day through a rough winter, and they’ve performed. These boots are rock solid, really comfortable, and absolutely waterproof out of the box. Triple-stiching and no unneeded seams around the lower half of the boots should keep them waterproof and solid for years.
customer_reviews.author: Matt L.

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, Replacable sole, strong soft leather.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 pairs of these boots for the past 5 years. I wear the boots daily on the railroad, walking on ballast. They have the railroad required height and 90° sole. I have replaced the soles on both pairs of boots one pair with the identical vibram sole and the second pair with vibram arctic grip. The arctic grip sole turns the boot to a PAC boot so that slip on spikes dont have to be worn in inclimate weather. Good waterproof boot, long life.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Seacat

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. I did try them on in a store (they only had the safety toe) and I usually wear size 10. The size 10D Danner Quarry fit perfect. Very stiff at first. I have been wearing them around the house for a few days to break them in a bit. They seem extremely well made. Time will tell how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: JasonS

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT STEEL TOE!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair for my husband In March of 2018 for work and he used them until the front started coming off they were steal toe! I reordered a new pair for him before we were going to redo his old ones up and bought this pair for 10$ cheaper without knowing they are not steel toe. To hear my husband hurt his toe and called me to say his boots are NOT steel toe I assured him I bought the same boots. Apparently not.. these come both in steel toe and not steel toe..
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Brunner

customer_reviews.title: Makes feet appear small.
customer_reviews.text: The boot is made well, comfortable but look like elf shoes when worn. I have a 9.5 size and will not wear them again for that reason...go to a Danner outlet and try them on before ordering online...my bad.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Price

customer_reviews.title: Liked them enough to buy another pair for work
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable right out of the box and true to size. These are the first lace up boots I have had in 10 years, support is great and easy to lace up. After watching several review videos on boots I did order a set of leather laces when I ordered these boots and have been using them from the first day, I do recommend upgrading the laces with leather ones.
customer_reviews.author: Leland

customer_reviews.title: Best boot I've ever worn!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable boot I've ever worn. My employer bought me a pair of these boots at an outfitter in town for just under 300 bucks, so when I saw them on Amazon for under 200 I had to buy a pair for home life. I have flat wide feet, and when I wear them it feels like I'm standing on clouds all day. Good quality, I've had my first pair for over a year and with all the jet fuel and muck I get on them they still work great (but I wash/oil them every couple months). Great boot for a modest price.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Little bigger than I thought, I might have gotten away without the extra extra wide version. They are comfortable and wearable right out of the box though. I'm a factory shift worker, 12 hour days on the factory floor kills your feet and back. These are great, I could maybe use a bit more heel padding though.
customer_reviews.author: MisterSaturn

customer_reviews.title: Top-Of-The-Line Boots, Attractive & Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Danner Boots to wear while riding my Motorcycle. They are Top-of-the-Line quality, heavy duty Leather, triple stitched, nice shallow lug Vibram soles, very attractive, high quality laces and perfect height at 8". I've spent lots on regular motorcycle boots, but they are never very comfortable, look like space shoes and I know the leather on these Danner is the absolute Best money can buy. I am very satisfied with my purchase and I bought them when I found them while on sale and received an outstanding deal, because they are pricey when not on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Big-D

customer_reviews.title: Love the boots
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots, a little liquid obanoughs and they’re like tenny runners. Would be a 5 Star except they don’t breathe well. Would do a 4.7 if I could as that is minor, just wish they’d offer these without that goretex crap. Been my experience that goretex breaks down in a couple months then you’ve got a boot that your feet sweat in and water penetrates so you pretty much have wet feet wether it’s wet or dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great work boot, very comfortable once broke in
customer_reviews.text: Ive had a pair of these for a year and just bought another to alternate, i keep seeing people say they dont size right but i looked up a size guide clnversion online and took a ruler to my foot to get the right size, fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great motorcycling boots.
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots; they run about a half size small. I am using these as motorcycle boots and they have been comfortable enough for all day riding in 95+ heat and heavy rain. The 8 inch height offers good protection and the Gore-tex keeps them from getting too hot. The Vibram sole grips the ground well and kept me upright on several occasions on loose gravel.
customer_reviews.author: SRW

customer_reviews.title: Hands down best boot for the money
customer_reviews.text: I won't wear any other boot. Best boot, by far, for the money. Last pair lasted me 2 years/40k+ miles. I don't even really wear sneakers anymore because these are comfortable enough for daily use... Even on the weekends!
customer_reviews.author: Erik V.

customer_reviews.title: tuff boots
customer_reviews.text: good boots so far.really tuff for me to break in,but worth the work.had to get better insoles as I have high arches.looking forward to giving them a workout
customer_reviews.author: WFO

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic work boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are high quality. They fit exactly as expected and are true to size. My hubs has been wearing these boots to work daily for a few months and says they are the best he’s ever had. I’ll update if that changes
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Don't feel like they hold up like they used to I've had probably five or six pairs
customer_reviews.text: These dont hold up like they did years ago. No tears or holes and seems like I get damp feet. No more danner for me. Quality went too crap in my opinion. Unless you buy the 400 super rain forrest!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: So far quality boot (no arch support)
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because I have only worn them to work for two weeks besides the non existent arch support so far I love them I really think for the price and the pride they claim to have for their boots they could include an extra pair of insoles that aren’t flat
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Horton

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Like the brown colored boots better than the black color because its very very hot in my town, theh browns ones were more expensive, I didn't like that. Other than that, great boots overall!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Hayward

customer_reviews.title: great boots
customer_reviews.text: Danner makes great boots. This is the second pair of thier boots i've bought in 10 years, and that's only because i walked the last pair bald. i did need to get aftermarket insole, but that's probably more personal preference/comfort.
customer_reviews.author: James K

customer_reviews.title: My review
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I want my feet and back not to hurt or be fatigued after hours of standing. The boot was tight in spots (across the ball) and loose in other areas (heel)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. M

customer_reviews.title: Best boots made!
customer_reviews.text: These American made boots are the best boots! They last, they're durable, they're comfortable! Highly recommend them to anyone that has to work on their feet all day in all conditions!
customer_reviews.author: John DiPaula

customer_reviews.title: Great work boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! Comfortable and durable! My husband is a Logger and wears them to work. He likes them so much that he buys a new pair when they wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the new boots
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 20 yr old son, who just graduated from UTI and was quickly employed, had to have new boots. His old Danner's lasted about 3 yrs. Very happy with the new boots, he believes they are more comfortable than the old pair, even when they were new. The price was actually cheaper through Amazon. We live in a small town, so I did some calling around to stores, which are at least an hour away. Amazon was about $15-$20 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: lynettenicks

customer_reviews.title: Great boots ,USA made boots are worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these Danner Quarry boots and they are great! The first pair are the Alloy toe and I still wear them and going on a year old.I have them on for 10-12 hours a day. I work in the landscaping business on uneven ground and a mechanic on a concrete floor and my feet are great at the end of the day! No break in time around the house!
customer_reviews.author: Tim OMeara

customer_reviews.title: The best general work boot available, period.
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement pair, so I wasn't expecting anything else, but in all honesty, these are the best boots ever made, imo. I let my last pair get too damaged for repairing, but in most cases, you can send these back in for complete re-working, at a fraction of the cost of a new pair of boots. Comfortable, sturdy, and if taken care of and sent in before the damage becomes too great, may last the rest of your life. What's not to like? Shipping was nearly immediate, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S.

customer_reviews.title: USA made
customer_reviews.text: These boot are worth every dollar I spent on them. I'm a big guy whose on my feet 10-12 hours a day and get a year plus out of them. I use to wear Chippewa boots and i was only get 4-6 months out of them for the same price. The only thing I liked about Chippewa's over these is the waxed boot laces.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Redmond

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Promptly returned the boots as were recieved with no insoles, leather tongue guard, boots did not come in a danner box nor have any danner paperwork. Buyer beware. If i could give this 0 stars i would. By far the worst purchase i have ever had on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: A LITTLE LARGER THAN EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: THE BOOTS WERE A LITTLE LARGER THAN EXPECTED I USE A DIFFERENT INSOLE IN MY BOOTS SO I JUST PUT IT ON TOP AND THEY FIT GOOD. VERY HAPPY WITH THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent N.

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these and wore them 4-6 days a week and 10-16 hours a day and they lasted me 7 years and I just had to buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Erica Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: ... year of hard work on these and still going good. only oiled em about twice in there life ...
customer_reviews.text: over a year of hard work on these and still going good. only oiled em about twice in there life if they last me 4 years like my Georgia's did ill be a danner fan for life. plus you cant bet the amazon price.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Frank

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable... fits great as danner fan I'm just waiting to see if they last
customer_reviews.author: Jeter206

customer_reviews.title: Best things I have ever had on my feet
customer_reviews.text: These boots are hands down the best things I have ever had on my feet. Tough as nails, but also extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Danners are very easy, but wears quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Love Danners easy to work on and short break in. Wears out quickly though!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph n Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They're very comfortable and it only took two days to break them in. Not too heavy and feel great all day. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: pdxmusicman

customer_reviews.title: recommended by ppl we know
customer_reviews.text: personally know others with these boots. ppl that work cattle, work for electric company and county road crew..they say they last longer and have less back issues...this is the only brand they will buy.
customer_reviews.author: too picky sometimes grumpy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These are a quality made boot, love Danner. I usually wear Cat's but resently switched a haven't regretted the decision.
customer_reviews.author: Reaper

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots.It took me some major tire kicking before I decided on the boots but in my opinion one of the better boots for the price.My only complaint was that I was missing 1 of the tongue protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Danner Quarry Boots
customer_reviews.text: Overall fit has suffered over the years. I have been waring Danner for 25 years and am considering looking for another boot manufacturer. Need a snug fit throughout and the toe is very loose and high like a bubble. Tighten up the toe would ya?
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting boots
customer_reviews.text: After more than a year of wearing these at work they are holding up well. My only complaint is that the soles get hard as a rock when they get cold. I like these boots so much I am considering getting a pair of the insulated ones for winter.
customer_reviews.author: mlt205

customer_reviews.title: Great boots.
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit great. The insoles that come with the, are not that comfortable so purchasing a nicer set is my only complaint. Otherwise the boots are a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking boots
customer_reviews.text: Great looking boots. I've only had them for a few days, but I am quite happy with my purchase. A very decent price for an American made boot. Fit just as expected, ordered my normal size. Will update my review after I get more use out of them in the upcoming winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D

customer_reviews.title: Best boots I own
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a sturdy work boot that will last don't look any further, do yourself a favor and reach a little further in your wallet and purchase these boots THEY ARE WORTH IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave V.

customer_reviews.title: business!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when I laced my boots up to go to work and the lace hook popped off. This is my second pair I have ordered from Amazon and have the boots be defected. Danner just might lose my buisness!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel smith

customer_reviews.title: Great boots from a great company
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate the quality of these boots, and bought them for work. I wear them approximately 12 hours a day. The fact that they are crafted in the United States of America is evident throughout. Great boots from a great company, how can you go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: so far so good. have had a issue with danner in the ...
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. have had a issue with danner in the past. bought foreign made boots that were not well made at all. the usa made ones makes me think danner is back on track. if you buy danners just make sure they specifically state that they are made is the usa.
customer_reviews.author: twiz

customer_reviews.title: Great work boots!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boyfriend for his birthday, he was a happy man. He did state that it took some time to break them in but once he wore them for a few days of work they were amazing boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box they are comfortable good looking and light as a feather
customer_reviews.text: I bounce between Redwing, Chippewa and Danner and I just got these for when the weather turns, figured I'd break them in around the house. Out of the box they are comfortable good looking and light as a feather, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N.

customer_reviews.title: Only boots too own !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, tend to run 1/2 size small so I had to exchange them. Woodbury Outfitters was awesome to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Al Jepsen

customer_reviews.title: Treat your feet.
customer_reviews.text: Best boots ever I’ve always warn dabbed boots never have let me down
customer_reviews.author: Raffi K.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable out of the box
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Comfortable out of the box and can be worn all day (in cool weather). Glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: L. R. Levy

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love Danner boots I think they are the best
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect danner quality for much less
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very pleased with these boots, with our prime membership we saved over $80 over store price! Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: karla hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Danner quarry boot
customer_reviews.text: These Boots are a great buy, holding up well. They are slightly wide even for a medium width. I have a narrow foot though. Very comfortable to wear all day
customer_reviews.author: Troy Nelsen

customer_reviews.title: I love these! Last pair of Danners lasted me 9 years.
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Last pair of Danners lasted me 9 years. Finally bought a new set!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Take a while to break in. But all in all great boots!
customer_reviews.author: jason davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfection !
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit , very comfortable , Sturdy support, Thick soles , let’s see how they hold up under stress!
customer_reviews.author: Davian S.

customer_reviews.title: The boot is well made and has held up great but is the most uncomfortable boot I have owned ...
customer_reviews.text: The boot is well made and has held up great but is the most uncomfortable boot I have owned from Danner. I bought it because I wanted a boot that was re-craftable and made in the USA. I will be switching back to another boot!
customer_reviews.author: KEN PARKS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Great boots and love they're built in America only wish the materials were too.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Great boot at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I have worn danner boots for over 15 years and they are the most comfortable boot straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try if you havent tried them.
customer_reviews.text: Good boot short break in time & probably the best fitting boot I've found in a long time. Been a Red Wing fan for years but they take forever to break in. Only downer is the insoles got to go other wise a great boot so far only been wearing them for 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably good!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, comfortable, well built, and waterproof right outta the box! Can't ask for more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon L.

customer_reviews.title: Very little break in time
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect one day break in Use them for work in construction
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Florio

customer_reviews.title: Wtf
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come with kilte!!! If I would've known that I would never have bought them.
customer_reviews.author: pastor_dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Husband loves these boots. They are made very well and are from Portland Oregon.
customer_reviews.author: Amie h

customer_reviews.title: Quarry + timberland insoles= perfection
customer_reviews.text: Get these boots and a pair of timberland pro anti fatigue insoles and you'll be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: CPayne

customer_reviews.title: ... wearing them a couple of weeks but they are nice so
customer_reviews.text: only been wearing them a couple of weeks but they are nice so far
customer_reviews.author: Danny hyde (Debner + Co)

customer_reviews.title: in proper size like a glove
customer_reviews.text: For everyone out the the boot fits about a size too large that's literally the only problem I have so far. in proper size like a glove. Like a glove. I have wider feet plenty of room for my toes. In standard width
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: True to size, and comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: stoner

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the money!
customer_reviews.text: It’s is my third pair in 10 years. 10-12hrs x 5 days a week of hard wear and tear. The best bang for buck in my opinion. I also like how they are locally made here in Oregon!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Best Work Boots I have Ever Worn
customer_reviews.text: Best Work Boots I have Ever Worn. No Break In For Me. Wish they came with extra Laces. Going on 1 yr.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Small

customer_reviews.title: Dependable
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this boot, 3rd pair I've ow ned. I'm a welder and work mill sites
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Risling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the boots. Size feels slightly smaller than other shoes the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: after that perfect, but that's what you expect from Danner
customer_reviews.text: One day break in for ankle, after that perfect, but that's what you expect from Danner.
customer_reviews.author: RamItOne

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT steel toe boots.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t expect steel toes in these boots, because they’re not. Therefore, the toe design of this boot is a bit different and fits a bit tighter on your foot when compared to the steel toe version of the Quarry.
customer_reviews.author: ricknoyce

customer_reviews.title: Great Workboots!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these boots for a week, but they were really comfortable right out of the box! They seem to be made really well, so only time will tell how long they'll last.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Childers

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite work boot. Comfortable right out of the box and they take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Firefighter boot
customer_reviews.text: Great Wildland Fire Fighting boot. This is my 3rd pair. They run a half size too large. I wear a 10.5 shoe and a 10 in Danner boots. You can't beat this price.
customer_reviews.author: Fire Truck

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Tough high quality American made boots just opening box you can see all the attention to detail and the quality of the materials.They fit great and comfortable right out of the box. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Jared Conover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fit. Comfortable on concrete 10 hours daily. No foot pain or fatiuge.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Neis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable strong and they seem like there going to last for a long time
customer_reviews.text: I had them for a week and so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best boot around
customer_reviews.text: Only boot for me. Comfortable. Durable. Does not breakdown after hard mechanic use.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My welder loved these boots. Said they hug his feet and so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Natalee Leslie

customer_reviews.title: THESE BOOTS HAVE GREAT SUPPORT.
customer_reviews.text: I WORK IN A FACTORY AS A MECHANIC AND THESE BOOTS ARE GREAT!!
customer_reviews.author: james fogle

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Fits good with no break in needed. All around good fit . Hal
customer_reviews.author: Hal W.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have spent the money before
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable work boots I've ever owned ,I work 12hrs a day on steel decks and my feet don't hurt now at the end of the day
customer_reviews.author: toby hartill

customer_reviews.title: On time
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't on time. But showed up within a hour of calling
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best boots I've owned, and I have been wearing work boots for almost 40 years. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on Time and good fit..
customer_reviews.text: So far so good.. Break in time was about two weeks.. Ordered a half size bigger fits good..Changed insoles to Dr, Schools.Let you know how they do after winter..
customer_reviews.author: Andres Rubalcava

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boots are awesome fit was per size chart. Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: shawn bern

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love these boots. have tried many others, including red wings, but these are da bomb. you wont be sorry
customer_reviews.author: scott c calendar

customer_reviews.title: My poor feet thank you
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very well made and fit perfectly. Very fast shipping straight from the factory for eighty dollars below retail. My poor feet thank you.
customer_reviews.author: dylan alm

customer_reviews.title: Best boots I've ever owned and will be buying them ...
customer_reviews.text: Best boots I've ever owned and will be buying them again. They fit perfect and are very comfortable from the moment I put them on
customer_reviews.author: Apollo

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, very comfortable, and well built. I work on my feet in a kitchen all day, and they keep my feet comfortable, clean, and protected. They are slip resistant and water proof. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Alexxx86663

customer_reviews.title: These boots are very nice, fit well and have a great look
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very nice, fit well and have a great look... Wearing wool or thick socks make them feel even better...
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D. Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing boot! This is the only boot I will own for work now. Very comfortable for a logger boot.
customer_reviews.author: brad dunavent

customer_reviews.title: The Danner Quarry 8" plain toe boots are big. ...
customer_reviews.text: The Danner Quarry 8" plain toe boots are big. I have always worn a size 9. I had to send these back and get an 8.5. Those fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B. Hurd

product_meta.title: Danner Men's Quarry USA Black Work Boot - 8-Inch
product_meta.description:
Our most popular work boot – now built in Portland, ore. We’ve developed a new vibram quarry outsole and upgraded the midsole to a single, solid piece for increased longevity. We've also updated the collar liner to be instantly comfortable and re-engineered the placement of the triple-stitching to reduce wear and tear over time. Using our universal 610 last, the US-made quarry has the same fit and feel as its predecessor.

At Danner, they are craftsmen. They pay attention to details. They forgo quantity for quality, with the knowledge that the boots they craft are no better than the hands that create them.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA and Imported
Danner's hand crafted stitchdown construction provides a wider platform for increased stability underfoot
Rugged hardware for secure fit and long lasting performance
